name: LA
WelcomeMessage: Welcome to Los Angeles! Start your urban challenges.

rewardItems.name: Golden Surfboard
rewardItems.description: A luxurious surfboard symbolizing LA's sunny beaches.

rewardItems.name: Silver Keychain
rewardItems.description: A sleek keychain featuring the LA skyline.

rewardItems.name: Bronze Badge
rewardItems.description: A small badge commemorating your visit to LA.

urbanChallenges.name: Air Pollution
urbanChallenges.description: High levels of PM2.5 and ozone are impacting air quality and public health.

options.description: Implement stricter emissions standards for vehicles
Encourage the use of public transportation and carpooling

urbanChallenges.name: Urban Planning
urbanChallenges.description: Residential areas are located too close to major pollution sources like highways and factories.

options.description: Relocate residential zones farther from highways
Create buffer zones with green spaces
Allow current zoning practices to continue

urbanChallenges.name: Traffic Congestion and Transportation
urbanChallenges.description: Severe traffic congestion leads to wasted time and increased emissions.

options.description: Implement congestion pricing in high-traffic areas
Encourage the use of personal vehicles

urbanChallenges.name: Housing Affordability and Homelessness
urbanChallenges.description: Rising housing costs have led to a growing homelessness crisis.

options.description: Increase funding for affordable housing projects
Provide incentives to developers for affordable housing

urbanChallenges.name: Disaster Resilience
urbanChallenges.description: Los Angeles faces risks from earthquakes, flooding, and wildfires.

options.description: Improve early warning systems for natural disasters
Rely on existing infrastructure and emergency plans

urbanChallenges.name: Waste Management
urbanChallenges.description: High levels of waste generation and low recycling rates are causing environmental issues.

options.description: Expand recycling programs and public awareness campaigns
Encourage composting and reduce single-use plastics
Continue with current waste management practices
